pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, February 16, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, February 16, 2017:

Strasbourg, France

2:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Strasbourg, France.

Strasbourg Airport
Strasbourg, France
    
Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity of arrival


10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will arrive at the European Parliament and be greeted by the President of the European Parliament, Antonio Tajani.

Louise Weiss Building 
Strasbourg, France
    
Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity


10:35 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of the European Parliament.

Louise Weiss Building
Strasbourg, France
    
Note for media: 

  • Pooled photo opportunity 


11:05 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver an address to the European Parliament.

European Parliament Hemicycle
Louise Weiss Building
Strasbourg, France

Note for media:

  • Open coverage


12:00 p.m.  The Prime Minister and the President of the European Parliament will hold a joint media availability.

Press Room, N-1.2
Louise Weiss Building 
Strasbourg, France

Note for media:

  • Open coverage


3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart Strasbourg, France, for Berlin, Germany.

Strasbourg Airport
Strasbourg, France
    
Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


Berlin, Germany

4:35 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Berlin, Germany.

Berlin Tegel Airport,
Berlin, Germany

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity of arrival


5:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of Germany, His Excellency Joachim Gauck.

Bellevue Palace
Berlin, Germany

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting


Note: all times local.
